report.title: UKBMS Occurrence Download Report
report.description: An occurrence list with a count attribute to be used in the UKBMS Detail Download Report, with filters for Indicia user, date start and end, location.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=parent.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id JOIN locations l2 ON s.location_id=l2.id JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND (CAST(cttl.taxon_list_id AS character varying)='#taxon_list_id#' OR '#taxon_list_id#' = '') #joins# WHERE parent.deleted = false AND #website_filter# #filters# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, parent.id as sample_id, l.name as site_name, s.id as subsample_id, split_part(l2.name, ' - ', 2) as section_name, parent.entered_sref, parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, cttl.taxon_meaning_id, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common

order_bys.order_by: l.name, section_name, parent.date_start, cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, o.id DESC

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: ID of the taxon list to show

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: location_list
param.description: Enter a comma separated list of location IDs
